entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
